databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT SI_KYUKA.SI_KYUKA_ID ,
SI_KYUKA.MS_SENIN_ID , SI_KYUKA.NENDO ,
SI_KYUKA.YUKYU_KYUKA , SI_KYUKA.RIKUJYO_KYUKA , SI_KYUKA.SENNAI_KYUJITSU , SI_KYUKA.SENNAI_KYUKA ,
SI_KYUKA.DELETE_FLAG , SI_KYUKA.SEND_FLAG , SI_KYUKA.VESSEL_ID , SI_KYUKA.DATA_NO , SI_KYUKA.USER_KEY , SI_KYUKA.RENEW_DATE , SI_KYUKA.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_KYUKA.TS
FROM SI_KYUKA
WHERE SI_KYUKA.DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO SI_KYUKA( SI_KYUKA_ID ,
MS_SENIN_ID , NENDO ,
YUKYU_KYUKA , RIKUJYO_KYUKA , SENNAI_KYUJITSU , SENNAI_KYUKA ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :SI_KYUKA_ID ,
:MS_SENIN_ID , :NENDO ,
:YUKYU＿KYUKA , :RIKUJYO＿KYUKA , :SENNAI＿KYUJITSU , :SENNAI＿KYUKA ,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE SI_KYUKA SET MS_SENIN_ID = :MS_SENIN_ID , NENDO = :NENDO ,
YUKYU_KYUKA = :YUKYU＿KYUKA , RIKUJYO_KYUKA = :RIKUJYO＿KYUKA , SENNAI_KYUJITSU = :SENNAI＿KYUJITSU , SENNAI_KYUKA = :SENNAI＿KYUKA ,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE SI_KYUKA_ID = :SI_KYUKA_ID AND TS = :TS
